net.dean.jraw.http

Class HttpHelper.RequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dean.jraw.http.HttpHelper.RequestBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    HttpHelper

    public static class HttpHelper.RequestBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class helps create a configuration for executing an HTTP request using Apache's HttpComponents.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • RequestBuilder

        public RequestBuilder(HttpVerb verb,
                      java.lang.String hostname,
                      java.lang.String path)
        Instantiates a new RequestBuilder
        Parameters:
        verb - The HTTP verb to use (GET, POST, etc)
        hostname - The name of the URL's host. Do not include the scheme (ex: "http://")
        path - The path relative to the root directory of the host.

    • Method Detail

      • args

        public HttpHelper.RequestBuilder args(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> args)
        Parameters:
        args - The arguments to use. If the verb uses form data (POST, PATCH, PUT), then these will be put into the request body. If the verb is "GET", then a query string will be appended to the path.
        Returns:
        This builder

      • json

        public HttpHelper.RequestBuilder json(org.codehaus.jackson.JsonNode json)
        Sets the JSON data to send. The HTTP verb must be PUT, POST, or PATCH.
        Parameters:
        json - The JSON data to send
        Returns:
        This builder
